title.rendered: 25% Off Toy Sale! + Charlie Brown + Schools

content.rendered:
25% OFF Toy Sale

Our annual 25% off sale is back and bigger than ever. This year ALL toys are included, and the sale lasts the entire month of October.

 

Free Halloween Book!

Kids who come in wearing their Halloween costume on Saturday, October 28th to our Macon and Warner Robins locations will receive a FREE copy of It’s the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brown. Promotion is good for ages 0-8. One free book per family. While supplies last.

 

Textbook Buyback

The new semester has started, but do you still have last semester’s books crowding your shelves? We can help!

Sell us your college textbooks and we will give you cash or store credit.

 

Teacher and School Discounts

Yes, it’s true! At Gottwals Books, we offer teacher and school discounts on many books and bulk order purchases.

excerpt.rendered: Our annual 25% off sale is back and bigger than ever. This year ALL toys are included, and the sale lasts the entire month of October.
